001package net.tvburger.jdl.common.patterns;
002
003import java.lang.annotation.*;
004
005/**
006 * Represents the <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Visitor_pattern">Visitor design pattern</a>.
007 *
008 * <p>A Visitor is a behavioral design pattern that separates an algorithm from the
009 * objects it operates on. Instead of embedding behavior in the elements themselves,
010 * a Visitor class encapsulates operations and “visits” elements to perform them.
011 *
012 * <p>This allows you to:
013 * <ul>
014 *     <li>Add new operations without modifying existing element classes</li>
015 *     <li>Keep related operations together in one class</li>
016 *     <li>Traverse complex object structures consistently</li>
017 * </ul>
018 */
019@Documented
020@DesignPattern(DesignPattern.Category.BEHAVIORAL)
021@Retention(RetentionPolicy.RUNTIME)
022@Target(ElementType.TYPE)
023public @interface Visitor {
024}
